https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/soDKuz7mgupTz5IDlGacyprx84M.jpg A down-and-out Santa is robbed of all the toys for all the poor kids in town. He searches for the thugs responsible and serves up his own brand of holiday cheer. Black Santa's Revenge
